articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Tesla shares drop 7% in premarket trading after Elon Musk says he is launching a political party - CNBC
articles.description: Elon Musk said he would form a new political party called the "America Party"
articles.content:
Tesla shares fell in premarket trade on Monday after CEO Elon Musk announced plans to form a new political party.
The stock was down 7.13% by 4:27 a.m. E.T.
Musk said over the weekend that the part… [+1957 chars]
